message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $10,000. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to get a bit closer to $10,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,250?  That way we both get a good deal.
